member.name: T:DotSpatial.Extensions.IExtension
member.summary: The IExtension interface represents the shared content between all providers and plugins. This simply acts like an on-off switch for enabling or disabling the extension.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Extensions.IExtension.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean that is true if the extension is active and running.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Extensions.IExtension.DeactivationAllowed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [deactivation is allowed].
member.value: true if [deactivation is allowed]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Extensions.IProjectFileProvider.Extension
member.summary: Gets the extension, which by convention will be lower case.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Extensions.ISampleProject
member.summary: Used to specify a sample .dspx project that the user can download as a package and open.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Extensions.ISampleProject.AbsolutePathToProjectFile
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to project file. This includes the directory, filename, and extension

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Extensions.ISampleProject.Name
member.summary: Gets the name to display to the user when they are selecting a project.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Extensions.ISampleProject.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the project

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Extensions.ISatisfyImportsExtension
member.summary: Extensions of this type are activiated before other extensions and may be used to help satisfy required imports.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Extensions.SplashScreens.ISplashScreenManager
member.summary: An interface that allows the creation of a splash screen extension, which will be loaded before other extensions.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Extensions.SplashScreens.ISplashScreenManager.ProcessCommand(System.Enum,System.Object)
member.param: The argument to pass to the command. See SplashScreenCommand for details reguarding each individual command.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Extensions.SplashScreens.SplashScreenCommand
member.summary: The type of splash screen command Supported operation is to change the display text.

member.name: F:DotSpatial.Extensions.SplashScreens.SplashScreenCommand.SetDisplayText
